articles.description: The Bison trailed by 10 points with under 50 seconds to go, but chip away at Colgate's lead before Kimbal Mackenzie hits the 3-pointer at the horn to win it.
articles.headline: Bucknell caps off comeback with buzzer-beater

images.caption: The Bison trailed by 10 points with under 50 seconds to go, but chip away at Colgate's lead before Kimbal Mackenzie hits the 3-pointer at the horn to win it.
images.name: Bucknell caps off comeback with buzzer-beater

articles.description: Jermaine Crumpton had 21 points and 10 rebounds on Monday night and Canisius pulled away early in the second half for an 81-63 win over Fairfield.
articles.headline: Canisius ties for 1st in MAAC with 81-63 win over Fairfield

articles.description: Francis Alonso had 20 points and Demetrius Troy scored 17 to help UNC Greensboro beat East Tennessee State 74-56 on Monday night to pull within one game of the Buccaneers in the Southern Conference standings.
articles.headline: UNCG beats ETSU 74-56, snaps nation's longest win streak

articles.description: Theo Pinson scored 14 of his 16 points after halftime to go with 10 rebounds, helping No. 14 North Carolina pull away late to beat Notre Dame 83-66 on Monday night.
articles.headline: No. 14 North Carolina pulls away late, tops Notre Dame 83-66

images.caption: Joel Berry II drives in the lane and sinks a floater while drawing a foul to set up a 3-point play for North Carolina.
images.name: Berry falls and scores while drawing foul

articles.description: The Big 12 Conference meat-grinder has taken its toll on Iowa State this season, and it's starting to chew its way through the early frontrunners, one of which was Kansas.
articles.headline: Big 12 tests continue for No. 13 Kansas, Iowa State

articles.description: All season long, No. 7 Texas Tech and No. 23 Oklahoma have been shining examples of two different ways to win games and gain national attention.
articles.headline: No. 7 Texas Tech aims to keep momentum vs. No. 23 Oklahoma
